languages.text: "Сделки? Нет. Меня вполне удовлетворит небольшой подарок — тебе даже не пришлось пачкать руки о Маражая".

traits.locale_text: "Сделки? Нет. Меня вполне удовлетворит небольшой военный презент — как знак признательности за то, что я избавил{mf||а} тебя от необходимости пачкать руки о Маражая".

languages.text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."
languages.original_text: "Сделки? Нет. Меня вполне удовлетворит небольшой подарок — тебе даже не пришлось пачкать руки о Маражая".

traits.locale_text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."
"A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."
"A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."
"A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."
"A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."

languages.text: "Einen Handel? Nein, ein symbolisches Geschenk reicht aus. Ihr musstet Euch mit Marazhai nicht einmal die Hände schmutzig machen."
languages.original_text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: "Einen Handel? Nein, ein symbolisches Gift reicht aus. Ihr musstet Euch mit Marazhai nicht einmal die Hände schmutzig machen."

languages.text: “交易？不，这只是善意的礼物而已。你甚至根本不需要亲自动手对付玛拉斋。”
languages.original_text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: “交易？不，这只是善意的礼物而已。你甚至根本不需要亲自动手对付玛拉斋。”

languages.text: « Pactiser ? Non, un cadeau symbolique fera l'affaire. Vous n'avez même pas eu à vous salir les mains avec Marazhai. »
languages.original_text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: « Pactiser ? Non, un cadeau symbolique fera l'affaire. Vous n'avez même pas eu à vous salir les mains avec Marazhai. »

languages.text: «¿Un trato? No, con un obsequio basta. No te ha hecho falta ni mancharte las manos con Marazhai».
languages.original_text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: «¿Un trato? No, con un obsequio basta. No te ha hecho falta ni mancharte las manos con Marazhai».

languages.text: 「取引だと？いや、ささやかなギフトで十分だ。お前はマラズハイと一緒になって手を汚す必要さえなかったんだ」
languages.original_text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: 「取引だと？いや、ささやかなギフトで十分だ。お前はマラズハイと一緒になって手を汚す必要さえなかったんだ」

languages.text: "Anlaşma mı? Hayır, sembolik bir armağan yeter. Marazhai konusunda ellerini kirletmene gerek kalmadı sonuçta."
languages.original_text: "A deal? No, just a token gift will suffice. You did not even have to get your hands dirty with Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşma mı? Hayır, sembolik bir armağan yeterli olacaktır. Marazhai ile ellerini kirletmek zorunda bile kalmadın."
